Pre-Game Insights: India are unbeaten in the T20 World Cup 2024, while England have got to the semi-final with some hiccups
Rohit Sharma broke India's milestone-orientated mould in his assault on Australia
Jos Buttler's brutal 83 from 38 balls against USA was the sort of range-hitting display that his England teams have habitually drilled themselves to produce in the nets
Adil Rashid returned a combined analysis of 3 for 42 in eight overs against India and Pakistan in the 2022 T20 World Cup knockouts
Kuldeep Yadav's scarcity value as a left-arm wrist spinner gives him added power to contort the unwary
England may be tempted to tinker with the balance that served them well through the Super Eight, in the expectation that four seamers is at least one more than the conditions will merit
There is no reserve day scheduled for this match, with the ICC citing insufficient travel time ahead of Saturday morning's final in Barbados
